sentences.en: Fear was the hostages' constant companion.
sentences.cn: 人质一直都感到恐惧不安。

sentences.en: For ten years he had been her constant companion .
sentences.cn: 十年来他一直陪伴她左右。

sentences.en: He gazed reflectively at his companion.
sentences.cn: 他盯着自己的同伴，若有所思。

sentences.en: He has been her constant companion for the last four months.
sentences.cn: 4个月来，他一直陪伴在她身边。

sentences.en: He led off with his companion in a sort of quick - step.
sentences.cn: 他和他的舞伴领头跳一种快步舞.

sentences.en: He pressed heavily on his companion's wrist.
sentences.cn: 他用力握着伙伴的手腕.

sentences.en: He turned to his companion before he replied.
sentences.cn: 他转身朝向他的伙伴然后回答.

sentences.en: He was a charming travelling companion.
sentences.cn: 他是个讨人喜欢的旅伴。

sentences.en: He was not a fit companion for their skipper that particular morning.
sentences.cn: 那天早晨，他没能和队长配合好。

sentences.en: He's not much of a companion for me.
His brother is not much of a companion for him.
sentences.cn: 他兄弟与他情趣不甚相投.

sentences.en: His dog became his closest companion .
sentences.cn: 他的狗成了他最亲密的伙伴。

sentences.en: That book forms a companion to the present volume.
sentences.cn: 那本书与现有的一册成为姊妹篇.

sentences.en: The boy struck at his companion who had jeered at him.
sentences.cn: 那男孩向嘲笑他的同伴打去.

sentences.en: The companion volume will soon be published.
sentences.cn: 这卷书的姊妹篇即将问世.

sentences.en: The seeing eye dog was the blind man's constant companion.
sentences.cn: 导盲犬是盲人的忠实伙伴.

sentences.en: They walked companion-ably back to the house.
sentences.cn: 他们友好地走回到那座房子。

words.tran_cn: 好交往的；友善的；适于做朋友的
伙伴的，同伴的；友爱的，友好的

trans.tran_cn: 同伴，陪伴，陪护，成对的物品之一，指南
trans.tran_en: someone you spend a lot of time with, especially a friend
